titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of the Biographical Directory of the United States Congress, 1774-2005.
A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of the Biographical Directory of the United States Congress, 1774-2005.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on March 24, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Implements the printing of a revised edition of the Biographical Directory of the United States Congress for the period ending with the 108th Congress.
